meanings.def: something that is given to a person or an organization such as a charity, in order to help them; the act of giving something in this way
examples: donation to somebody/something to make a donation to charity
The work of the charity is funded by voluntary donations.
The campaign has raised £200 000 through online donations.
Leave your donations with the staff on reception any time during opening hours.
The project is funded by public donation.
The charity has received over $10 million in donations.
a donation towards the building of a new hospital
We received a generous donation from the people of the local church.

meanings.def: the act of allowing doctors to remove blood or a body organ in order to help somebody who needs it
examples: Organ donation has not kept pace with the demand for transplants.
